CHAT.comment: DONNA RAE EGELHOFF, Petitioner v. SAMANTHA EGELHOFF, A MINOR, BY AND THROUGH HER NATURAL PARENT KATE BREINER, AND DAVID EGELHOFF
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM J. KILBERG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA B. McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE [*15] PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF [*24] THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF WILLIAM J. KILBERG ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:00 noon, the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
